entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Tadoule Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 10:27 AM CST Saturday 18 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Sunny, -29.9°C

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 30.
